Cognitive Architect

Top / tools / ca / Cognitive Architect

Overview

Cognitive Architect is the online, IBM Built, replacement for Rational System Architect as a primary tool to build method driven architectures in a team driven manner.

Why Cognitive Architect

  • Team Driven: Cognitive Architect allows multiple editors on an architecture. This has always been an issue with other Architecture tools, including Rational System Architect.
  • Artifacts based on Team Solution Design, an IBM approved architectural method.
  • Simple to use! While it doesnâ€™t have all the capabilities of larger tool suites, it is under constant development and it is a strategic IBM tool that will continue to improve.

Onboarding

  • Info on Cognitive Architect can be found here.
  • Access Cognitive Architect directly from here.
